item.description:
First Day of Spring Walk
Saturday, March 20, 10 a.m.

Meet at Falzone Field, 901 Trapelo Road

This spring walk led by David Kehs, a member of the Waltham Land Trust's Board of Directors and its Land Commitee will explore Lot 1 which is one of Waltham's newly acquired open spaces. The walk will last about 2 hours.

Be sure to dress for the weather. Wear sturdy shoes, but if the weather has been rainy, boots may be more appropriate. Watch www.walthamlandtrust.org for an update on the trail conditions and more details on the walk.
item.name: First Day of Spring walk, oganized by the Waltham Land Trust
